subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: The double Olympic champion Kosuke Kitajima of Japan set a world record in the men’s 200-meter breaststroke. Wearing Speedo’s LZR Racer, Kitajima finished in 2 minutes 7.51 seconds at the Japan Open in Tokyo, taking almost a second off the previous mark, by Brendan Hansen in 2006.
